title: Blosh Scents | Floral Scent-infused Chips | 80g net weight | Home Fragrance | Turare Wuta (Ashen Bloom)
features: AUTHENTIC COLLECTION: Features three distinctive fragrances - Oudh Blossom, Ashen Bloom, and Desert Musk, each carefully crafted with premium ingredients
NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Combines agarwood, cedarwood, natural resins, musk crystals and fragrance oils for a luxurious aromatic experience.
FRAGRANCE PROFILES: Each variant offers unique floral and musk notes, creating an enchanting atmosphere in your space
TRADITIONAL BAKHOOR: Premium incense crafted combining Middle Eastern and Northen Nigerian methods for a genuine experience
PACKAGING: Each fragrance comes in an 80g jar with secure lid, perfect for preserving the delicate aromatic compounds
description: Transform your space with this exquisite collection of authentic Bakhoor incense. Featuring three distinctive fragrances - Oudh Blossom, Ashen Bloom, and Desert Musk - each 80g jar contains a carefully crafted blend of premium ingredients. Oudh Blossom combines agarwood resins with floral and musk notes for a rich, sophisticated scent. Ashen Bloom offers a harmonious fusion of cedarwood, musk crystals, and floral fragrance oils layered with precious resins. These modern incense blends are presented in elegant jars with secure lids, perfect for preserving the aromatic compounds. Whether used for meditation, ambiance, or special occasions, these Bakhoor varieties deliver long-lasting, authentic fragrances that create a luxurious atmosphere in any setting. The Turare wuta chips serve as the perfect base for these meticulously formulated scents.
